resources.name: gold
resources.description: Gold is mined from gold mines.

resources.name: iron
resources.description: Iron is mined from iron mines.

combatTypes.name: Conquer
combatTypes.description: Attack to take over town if victorious.

combatTypes.name: Scout
combatTypes.description: Scout to get information about your opponent.

combatTypes.name: Raze
combatTypes.description: Attack to destroy town if victorious.

shields.name: newbie protection
shields.description: Your town is protected from all attacks for some time.

buffs.name: 24 Hour Shift
buffs.description: Increases production ratio of all harvest buildings inside this town for the next 24 hours.

0.name: Metallurgy
0.description: Allows the use of iron in armor and weapons.

1.name: Military training
1.description: Allows the training of basic military units.

2.name: Advanced military training
2.description: Allows the training of advanced military units.

3.name: Horse breeding
3.description: Allows the training of mounted units.

5.name: Advanced Gold Mining
5.description: Allows accelerated mining of gold in mines.

6.name: Advanced Wood Cutting
6.description: Allows accelerated wood cutting for lumber jacks.

7.name: Advanced Iron Mining
7.description: Allows accelerated mining of iron in mines.

modules.name: Gold mine
modules.description: The Gold Mine produces gold. Upgrade it to boost its production and worker capacity.

modules.name: Laboratory
modules.description: The Laboratory allows you to research new Technologies in order to increase your Towns capabilities.

modules.name: Blackmarket
modules.description: Here at the Blackmarket, you can buy components, resources and other useful items.

modules.name: Farm
modules.description: Farms provide food to field larger armies.

modules.name: Wargate
modules.description: Required to attack other players with your troops.

modules.name: Hall of Heroes
modules.description: Hire powerful and unique heroes of the land here.

components.name: Red Flag
components.description: Required to use RAID attack on an enemy (test-item).

components.name: Black Flag
components.description: Required to use CONQUER or RAZE attack on an enemy (test-item).

units.name: Spearman
units.description: A peasant behind armor, armed with a spear.

units.name: Pikeman
units.description: Spearmen trained before being deployed, with better armor and a self improved spear.

units.name: Fencer
units.description: Dual sword wielding warrior who sacrifices armor for agility.

units.name: Swordsman
units.description: Trained in the use of the sword and shield, the Swordsman is the backbone of the army.

units.name: Knight
units.description: Elite armored warrior trained in the use of the sword and shield.

units.name: Bowman
units.description: Bowmen provide great ranged damage but lack the protection of plate armor.

units.name: Longbowman
units.description: Longer bows make for greater damage while plate armor provides greater protection.

units.name: Mounted spearman
units.description: A spearman on a horse.

units.name: Mounted swordsman
units.description: A swordsman on a horse.

units.name: Mounted knight
units.description: A knight on a horse.

units.name: Spy
units.description: Trained in the arts of sneaking and deception spies are fast and deadly.

units.name: Militia
units.description: When there are witches to be burned or rampant bears to be guided back to the forest.

units.name: Thug
units.description: Reformed peasant. Because crime does pay. Sometimes. Not really.

units.name: Bandit
units.description: Survive the road long enough and you become a bandit.

units.name: Militia bowman
units.description: A peasant with a bow. Bring the apples.

units.name: Ranger
units.description: When you live in the woods and you're not a bandit you're a ranger.

units.name: Thief
units.description: They'll go there if there's something to pinch.

units.name: Tower
units.description: Standing tall and proud.

units.name: Wall
units.description: Between a rock and a hard place.

units.name: Warrior hero
units.description: Limited to one unit at a time.

units.name: Wizard hero
units.description: Limited to one unit at a time.

units.name: Ranger hero
units.description: Limited to one unit at a time.
